name: G-MODEアーカイブス50 ミッドナイトホラースクール
name_original: G-MODEアーカイブス50 ミッドナイトホラースクール
description:
Can you save the school from a crisis with your mysterious powers?
Mystery-solving adventure set in a school at midnight.
"Midnight Horror School" is based on a 3DCG animation work that was broadcast on CS,
It is an adventure game produced and distributed for feature phones in the past.

Ghosts are born from forgotten tools,
The Midnight Horror School", where players can take classes to create "wonders" to prove their existence.
Players control "Hickey," a red and blue pencil ghost boy,
The player controls "Hickey," a ghost boy with red and blue pencils, and selects two of his friends to form a party according to the situation and solve the mysteries that occur at the school.

Find the "entities" (tools or objects) of your friends and revive them to find a way to save the school.

■ About G-MODE Archives
The G-MODE Archives is a reissue project that faithfully recreates old feature phone games as they were back then.

In order to enjoy the app as it was back then, the web-connected menu, buttons, and keys have been transplanted, but some of them may not work.
For more information on the Steam version, press START button and see the "How to play" in the PAUSE menu.
